quote: You might be looking for reasons but there are no reasons.
author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still

quote: Your purpose is your why.
author: Deborah Day

quote: To question reason is to trust it.
author: Mitch Stokes

quote: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Reason is the power or capacity whereby we see or detect logical relationships among propositions.
author: Alvin Plantinga,  Warranted Christian Belief

quote: Love with passion. Love for no reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Reason is a whore, the greatest enemy that faith has; it never comes to the aid of spiritual things, but more frequently than not struggles against the divine Word, treating with contempt all that emanates from God.
author: Martin Luther

quote: The reason for the unreason with which you treat my reason , so weakens my reason that with reason I complain of your beauty.
author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quote: The heart has its reasons but the mind makes the excuses.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: because he's Will
author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass

quote: Because you let our love just fall apartYou no longer have my heart
author: Boyz II Men

quote: Reason is in fact the path to faith, and faith takes over when reason can say no more.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: One might have said that reason made him flee from reason.
author: André Maurois,  Disraeli: A Picture of the Victorian Age

quote: I'm trying to make some sense out of the phrase "Everything happens for a reason,"and I think I've figured out what the reason is - to pissed me off.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: What is called a reason for living is also an excellent reason for dying.
author: Albert Camus,  The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays

quote: To see the beauty, love
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.
author: Thomas Mann,  The Magic Mountain

quote: because being with you makes perfect sense
author: Tim McGraw

quote: The computer focuses ruthlessly on things that can be represented in numbers. In so doing, it seduces people into thinking that other aspects of knowledge are either unreal or unimportant. The computer treats reason as an instrument for achieving things, not for contemplating things. It narrows dramatically what we know and intended by reason.
author: George Friedman,  The Next 100 Years: A Forecast for the 21st Century

quote: We have forty million reasons for failure, but not a single excuse.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Because...because...she came here with me.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The fact that life has no meaning is a reason to live --moreover, the only one.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: Behind every trial and sorrow that He makes us shoulder, God has a reason.
author: Khaled Hosseini,  A Thousand Splendid Suns

quote: The fact that life has no meaning is a reason to live-moreover, the only one.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: Suicide Note [10w] "Don't ask why I committed suicide.Question why everybody doesn’t.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Reason is, and ought only to be the slave of the passions.
author: David Hume

quote: I set out to discover the why of it, and to transform my pleasure into knowledge.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Man is able to decide for or against reason, he is able to create beyond reason or to destroy below reason
author: Paul Tillich,  Dynamics of Faith

quote: Love your life. Because your life is what you have to give.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Love without judging. Love without reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Because you are beautiful. I enjoy looking at beautiful people, and I decided a while ago not to deny myself the simpler pleasures of existence
author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quote: A student, filled with emotion and crying, implored, "Why is there so much suffering?"Suzuki Roshi replied, "No reason.
author: Shunryu Suzuki,  Zen Is Right Here: Teaching Stories and Anecdotes of Shunryu Suzuki, Author of "ZEN Mind, Beginner's Mind"

quote: You life matters. You are here for a reason. Your job is to determine why.
author: Michael Hyatt,  Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

quote: Faith is stronger than so-called reason.
author: Hermann Hesse,  The Journey to the East

quote: Adrian, I'm on a date. Why are you here? On my car?
author: Richelle Mead,  The Golden Lily

quote: Each day begins a new journey of life, for if we awake, there is a reason.
author: Bethanie Armstrong

quote: To see the magic of life look through the wondrous eyes of a child.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Only ignorance excuses stupidity
author: Nalini Singh,  Angels' Blood

quote: Children astound me with their inquisitive minds. The world is wide and mysterious to them, and as they piece together the puzzle of life, they ask 'Why?' ceaselessly.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: How quick come the reasons for approving what we like.
author: Jane Austen,  Persuasion

quote: Philosophy is one reason which could lead to death.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: All of us suffer some injuries from experiences that seem to have no rhyme or reason. We cannot understand or explain them. We may never know why some things happen in this life. The reason for some of our suffering is known only to the Lord.
author: James E. Faust

quote: And yet,to say the truth, reason and love keep little company together nowadays.
author: William Shakespeare,  A Midsummer Night's Dream

quote: I cut myself because you wouldn't let me cry.I cried because you wouldn't let me speak.I spoke because you wouldn't let me shine.I shone because I thought you loved me...
author: Emilie Autumn,  The Asylum for Wayward Victorian Girls

quote: To alcohol! The cause of... and solution to... all of life's problems
author: Matt Groening
